mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nvecaretemplate (ecare_no, seg, template) VALUES (#{newEcareNo}, #{templateVo.seg}, #{templateVo.template})
INSERT INTO nvecaretemplate (ecare_no, seg, template, kakao_buttons, conts_no) VALUES (#{no}, #{seg}, #{template}, #{kakaoButtons, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{contsNo})
mapper.select: SELECT ecare_no, seg, template FROM nvecaretemplate

SELECT a.seg, a.template, a.kakao_buttons, CASE WHEN a.seg = ' ' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as seg_no , CASE WHEN b.kakao_image_no IS NULL THEN '' ELSE (SELECT file_preview_path FROM nvmobilecontents WHERE conts_no = b.kakao_image_no) END as image_url , a.conts_no FROM nvecaretemplate a, nvecaremsg b WHERE a.ecare_no = b.ecare_no AND b.ecare_no = #{ecareNo} ORDER BY seg_no

SELECT a.template, a.kakao_buttons, b.kakao_quick_replies, b.conts_no, b.file_preview_path as image_url FROM nvecaretemplate a left outer join nvmobilecontents b ON a.conts_no=b.conts_no WHERE a.ECARE_NO= #{ecareNo}
SELECT kakao_buttons FROM nvecaretemplate WHERE ecare_no = #{ecareNo} AND seg = ' '
